A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Despite all of the critical acclaim. This movie was absolute garbage. By far the worst Star wars movie to date. The entire movie serves almost no purpose\, and does nothing to advance the story or saga forward. 

The movie is two and half hours of mundane\, that tries to be different just for the sake of it. It takes everything that was setup by TFA and just brushes it aside. 

The portrayal of Luke was horrible and so far removed from everything we know about him. They managed to take Finn\, a character that was a bright spot in TFA and devalue him to the point he is irrelevlant. 

RIAN Johnson should not be allowed near the star wars franchise ever again. I'm hoping that Episode IX can salvage the mess that we are left with.
